name: The Pen Trivia Game | 'Seinfeld' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Morty Seinfeld looking for in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Scotch Tape.

	Morty vows to hide the scotch tape next time he has it so that nobody can find it.  He stops the search when Elaine and Jerry arrive.  It turns out that Jack took the tape.

questions.text: How much money does Jerry pay per day for his rental car?
questions.explanation:
Twenty-five dollars.

	Jerry's parents say that Jerry could use their car, but he doesn't want to.  Jerry also says that he didn't pay for insurance on his rental car.

Doris.

	Jack Klompus and his wife return to the show a few more times during the series.  He sends raincoats to New York for Morty, and he and Jerry fight over a Cadillac.

questions.text: Who gives Jerry the astronaut pen?
questions.explanation:
Jack.

	Jack offers the pen to Jerry, and Jerry takes it because he thinks it would be useful when he needs to write something upside-down in bed.

The bed.

	Elaine voluntarily sleeps on the pull-out bed, and she can't sleep because it's too hot.  There's also a thick metal bar in the bed, so she wrecks her back.

Yes.

	Jerry goes scuba diving and Elaine stays at the condo because her back hurts.  When Jerry gets back, he tells everyone about how his capillaries burst underwater.

questions.text: What does Elaine take to help her back?
questions.explanation:
Muscle relaxants.

	Elaine arrives at the party dazed and confused.  Apparently, she took too many of the muscle relaxant pills that day.

questions.text: What does Jerry wear to the party to make his eye problems unnoticeable?
questions.explanation:
Sunglasses.

	Both Jerry and Elaine arrive at the party with something wrong.  Morty is still angry with Jack after an argument they had that afternoon.

questions.text: What is the name of Jerry's aunt?
questions.explanation:
Stella.

	When Elaine is introduced to Stella, she begins screaming Stella to mimic a dramatic moment from "A Streetcar Named Desire".

questions.text: Do George and Kramer appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
No.

	George and Kramer are still in New York.  This is one of the few episodes where Jerry's apartment is also not seen.  The "Chinese Restaurant" is another episode without the apartment or Kramer.
